医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类抗生素耐药性负担与社区获得饮用水和卫生设施之间的关系研究人员确定了卫生条件改善和水质改善与人类肠道抗生素抗性基因频率之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/The-relationship- Between-the-burden-of-antibiotic-resistance-in- humans-and-community-access-to-drinking-water-and-卫生.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/The-relationship- Between-the-burden-of-antibiotic-resistance-in- humans-and-community-access-to-drinking-water-and- sanitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=423f2983-f156-44e4-8fd8-ba01edeb0809 Wed, 05 Jul 2023 06:09:00 -0400 The relationship between the burden of antibiotic resistance in humans and community access to drinking water and sanitation
适合战胜糖尿病：孟德尔随机研究证实运动的力量研究人员调查了心肺健康与 2 型糖尿病之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Fit-to-beat-diabetes-mendelian-randomization-study-confirms-the-power-of-exercise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Fit-to-beat-diabetes-mendelian-randomization-study-confirms-the-power-of-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb37e63a-8e0e-47bb-80ac-122788596e3c Wed, 05 Jul 2023 05:24:00 -0400 Fit to beat diabetes: mendelian randomization study confirms the power of exercise
肺部以外：揭示 SARS-CoV-2 的多器官影响研究人员介绍了 SARS-CoV-2 感染大脑并影响记忆的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Beyond-the-lungs-SARS-CoV-2s-multi-organ-impact-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Beyond-the-lungs-SARS-CoV-2s-multi-organ-impact-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deca6e7d-24cd-4ddc-b05d-73669800374d Wed, 05 Jul 2023 04:40:00 -0400 Beyond the lungs: SARS-CoV-2's multi-organ impact revealed
利用人工智能的力量：深度学习模型预测肺炎病例 30 天死亡率研究人员开发了一种深度学习 (DL) 模型来估计肺炎 30.0 天的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Harnessing-the-power-of-AI-deep-learning-model-forecasts-30-day-mortality-in-pneumonia-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230705/Harnessing-the-power-of-AI-deep-learning-model-forecasts-30-day-mortality-in-pneumonia-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4434b03a-2317-411d-a2c2-14fa2c99dbea Wed, 05 Jul 2023 03:59:00 -0400 Harnessing the power of AI: deep-learning model forecasts 30-day mortality in pneumonia cases
AANS、CNS 敦促 CMS 敲定规则以改进事先授权今天，美国神经外科医生协会 (AANS) 和神经外科医生大会 (CNS) 与 61 名两党参议员和 233 名众议院议员一起敦促美国卫生与公众服务部以及医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) ）迅速敲定规则，以提高透明度、简化和标准化事先授权 (PA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/AANS-CNS-urge-CMS-to-finalize-rules-to-improve-prior-authorization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/AANS-CNS-urge-CMS-to-finalize-rules-to-improve-prior-authorization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff2ea5df-271e-4e35-ae25-67662e477504 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 23:22:00 -0400 AANS, CNS urge CMS to finalize rules to improve prior authorization
送酒上门与饮酒量增加和酗酒有关在 COVID-19 大流行期间，许多州扩大了在线酒类销售和酒类送货上门的法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Home-delivery-of-alcohol-linked-to-increased-alcohol-conspiration-and-binge-drinking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Home-delivery-of-alcohol-linked-to-increased-alcohol-conspiration-and-binge-drinking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea7f033c-198e-404c-8806-e456d1152a07 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 23:15:28 -0400 Home delivery of alcohol linked to increased alcohol consumption and binge drinking
研究发现口腔微生物群、酒精代谢和宿醉严重程度之间的相关性宿醉在饮酒者中很常见。先前的研究表明，一次饮酒后可能会出现精神和身体痛苦的宿醉，同时也表明酒精快速分解为乙醛与不太严重的宿醉有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-finds-correlation- Between-oral-microbiome-alcohol-metabolism-and-hangover-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-finds-correlation- Between-oral-microbiome-alcohol-metabolism-and-hangover-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a754387-3193-49c9-a88a-143c6929a46a Tue, 04 Jul 2023 23:12:00 -0400 Study finds correlation between oral microbiome, alcohol metabolism, and hangover severity
遭受种族歧视的黑人更有可能渴望酒精对酒精的渴望与酒精使用障碍（AUD）治疗后的复发有关。一项新的研究首次探讨了人际种族歧视的独特经历如何导致人们对酒精的渴望增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Black-individuals-who-experience-racial-discrimination-more-likely-to-crave-alcohol.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Black-individuals-who-experience-racial-discrimination-more-likely-to-crave-alcohol.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab00e406-11b2-4104-b35c-9446665d9a36 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 23:06:00 -0400 Black individuals who experience racial discrimination more likely to crave alcohol
酒精使用障碍可导致大脑形态加速老化酒精使用障碍 (AUD) 是一种常见的神经精神疾病，以神经心理缺陷和神经回路脑损伤为特征，可能给家庭、工作和个人福祉带来严重的负面后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Alcohol-use-disorder-can-lead-to-accelerated-aging-of-brain-morphology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Alcohol-use-disorder-can-lead-to-accelerated-aging-of-brain-morphology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d567bc7-3ac7-4891-8c5a-f2c1f3bf9a96 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:58:00 -0400 Alcohol use disorder can lead to accelerated aging of brain morphology
初生成年人的疼痛和焦虑与大量饮酒有关经历过疼痛的新兴成年人（18 至 24 岁）更有可能出现酗酒等高风险饮酒模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pain-and-anxiety-linked-to-heavy-episodic-drinking-in-emerging-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pain-and-anxiety-linked-to-heavy-episodic-drinking-in-emerging-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e48f3723-cca2-4996-8660-b8c096adcf88 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:57:00 -0400 Pain and anxiety linked to heavy episodic drinking in emerging adults
